ygData.msgSnippet: Tucson wasn t about to give up now.  But he had not had time to formally assemble a plan of attack.  This was it, he had to literally do things as if

Tucson wasn't about to give up now.  But he had not had time to formally as=
semble a plan of attack.  This was it, he had to literally do things as if =
travelling on an off road path, not sure of where it would lead him, as lon=
g as his wheels could still carry him through the distance.  First he repli=
es to Legacy.

" An old artifact I had found on Atlantis, strange that you =
mention Human history because when I found it, I was not sure as to what I =
had found and how it came to rest there.  It was the only fragment of stone=
 pictograph I found.  But there it was, the legend of the Hydra.  I swear I=
'm not making this up...  But I don't know of its true origin. Anyway, Lega=
cy, I'm getting pretty sick of the Predacons and Decepticons bullying my co=
mrades around like mindless pawns.  Rodimus is right, it's about time I did=
 something, and even though no formal strategy is in place, I don't intend =
to fall to anyone.  This is Tucson Prime, signing off, will reconnect with =
you shortly."

He was furious at this point.  He wanted the fighting to end=
.  And he was willing to go one on one to win back his comrade's freedom.  =
Cyclonus had been a very large thorn in his side.  And now, he was going to=
 prove a thorn in his!

" Rodimus, I want you to make a run for the door, t=
ake the others with you, including Darkhawk, and form a protective barrier =
around him. Legacy is going to open an escape path for us.  But first, it's=
 about time I won our side some pay back."

He cracks his knuckles and star=
es coldly at Cyclonus.

" You want to take the Autobots down, you'll have t=
o get past me first, Cyclonus!  And this time, I'm not holding anything bac=
k!"

Night Shift knew what Tucson Prime was up to.  Although he had never r=
eally done things typically, Tucson Prime had never disappointed anyone as =
of yet.  

"Woahh, we're gonna have ourselves a one on one.  Tucson Prime a=
gainst Cyclonus...  Ohhh I remember these times when Optimus would go again=
st Megatron in the old days." 

Outside, Rat Trap and Quickstride decide to=
 follow Legacy, as Rat Trap sits atop his comrade's back, waiting to gallop=
 in at a moment's notice.

" Ooooh I gotta be nuts but I'll do anythn' ta h=
elp Wheels win this fight."

Quickstride snorts.

" I've been itchn' for a =
brawl all afternoon!  SO WHO CAN SAY DECEPTICSCRAP?!"

Rat Trap chimes in.
=

"And Prediscrap!" 

Night Shift reports to Legacy, Lord Elder,Rat Trap, Lo=
rd Perseus, and Quickstride.

"Yo, Night Shift here, I'm broadcastn' from N=
injabot Radio Network, you're missn' some real hot tension buildn' up in he=
re.  I think Tucson Prime's sick of Cyclonus's scrap and he's lookn' ta go =
one on one ta show 'em what he's really made of.  I ain't never seen 'em th=
is steamed off but slag, he's got a look in his face like he's itchn' ta do=
 some major damage.  Maybe you'll get in here just in time ta take advantag=
e of some newly fallen spare parts..  Maybe, that's if there are any."

Rat=
 Trap's face beams with joy.

" I wouldn't miss that for the world!  Boooya=
hhh, that's a fight I gotta see!"

Quickstride snorts.

" Count me in, I do=
n't wanna miss a single part of the action!"

Inside, Tucson turns quickly =
to Rodimus.

" This is it Rodimus, this is where our tables are going to tu=
rn, and then, we will make these Predacons and Decepticons eat their words.=
  We aren't going to run, we're going to fight and we're going to give it o=
ur all!  AUTOBOTS, MAXIMALS, ASSUME YOUR BATTLE MODES AT THIS TIME AND EREC=
T ALL SHIELDS SURROUNDING THE OLD MAXIMAL BASE AND THE ARK!  WE WILL PROTEC=
T OUR OWN AND VANQUISH OUR ENEMIES!  WE'RE GOING TO TAKE BACK THIS PLANET A=
ND TURN THINGS AROUND FOR THE INNOCENT!  THIS FIGHT IS FOR FREEDOM, NOT POW=
ER, AND WE WILL TAKE IT BACK!"

Rat Trap had been slightly incorrect.  Tucs=
on Prime was now making it clear.  Fall back, give room to assemble for bat=
tle.  It wasn't just his fight, this fight was for everyone's freedom, and =
now he looks straight ahead.

"Huh, is he sayn' what I think he's sayn'?"

=
He waits with anticipation.  Inside Tucson Prime pauses for just one moment=
, and then with almost a roar in his voice..

"AUTOBOTS, MAXIMALS, ATTACK!"=
  

Rat Trap holds on for dear life.

"CHAAAARGE!"

Quickstride rears and b=
olts behind Legacy.

"About time we did somethn'! I was gettn' bored!"

Ins=
ide, Tucson Prime throws a powerful punch and launches one of his large mis=
siles from his missile carrier, attempting to open fire on the enemy to sha=
ke them up a bit.  Night Shift attempts to do the same with his photon blas=
t riffle.

" That's right, you be messn' with the wrong bots slag balls!"

=

hlight and continue his trip towards the exit

 voice transmitted to Kup.

 Fortress, the frame and
> the wall surrounding it began to smoke under the=
 assault that massive
> tank that was Legacy was bringing to bear against i=
t!
> 
> Then with a loud crash the door and it's frame, rather than
> vapor=
izing, fell to the ground in a long arc. Interestingly, the
> specialized h=
eat resistant armor that normally protected the walls and
> doors of the fo=
rtress against the searing heat from the lava, now

ices, much like a drawbridge over a moat, to

va and into the Black Fortress itself!
>

to the Autobots and Maximals, "I am
> resuming my entry into the Black Fort=
ress to assist Rodimus and
> Tuscon. Kup, I would suggest you rendevous wit=
h me as soon as you're
> able, the path behind me should be a safe egress."=

> 
> "Rat Trap, Quickstride." Legacy's cold voice intoned, "You have the
>=
 option to accompany me if you desire." With that Legacy's lights came
> on=
, illuminating the entrance he had just made as he began to go
> inside.

ernal defences that the fortress tried to bring against him. So far

s holding.
